posts.title: The Shawshank Redemption
posts.html_description: Andy Dufresne - who crawled through a river of s*** and came out clean on the other side.
posts.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
posts.author: Stephen King

posts.title: The Godfather
posts.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
posts.html_description: It's A Sicilian Message. It means Luca Brasi sleeps With The Fishes.
posts.author: Carlyle Bradshaw

posts.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
posts.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
posts.html_description: This is somehighlighted text among some other text
posts.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
